alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 10:27AM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snowfall today and tonight of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph on the highest peaks. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. Expect a lull in the snowfall this morning, then a return of heavier snow this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Outdoor recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy snow and strong winds. Avalanche danger will likely increase.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
